name.en: Community amateur sports clubs (CASCs) registered with HMRC

description.en:
This is the list of Community amateur sports clubs (CASCs) registered with HMRC, and as listed at HMRC [1], which has been enhanced with unique identifiers.

[1]: https://www.gov.uk/government/publications/community-amateur-sports-clubs-casc-registered-with-hmrc--2

access.onlineAccessDetails: The list is available in CSV and JSON formats

data.dataAccessDetails: In addition to the CSV format, the repository contains a JSON file: https://github.com/ThreeSixtyGiving/cascs/blob/master/cascs.json
data.licenseDetails: The original list of CASCs from HMRC is licensed under an Open Government Licence, v3: https://www.nationalarchives.gov.uk/doc/open-government-licence/version/3/
